allData.occupation: AI Transformation Lead & New Technology Enthusiast at Healthcare Bayer AG

positions.title: AI Transformation Lead & Visionary Strategist Marketing & Healthcare Innovation Enthusiast
positions.description:
As a Generative AI Transformation Lead in Healthcare, the role involves pioneering AI-driven digital solutions to improve services for patients and healthcare professionals, enhancing overall healthcare quality.

- Strategic AI Solution Development: Expert in developing AI strategies for business transformation and 
   specific industry use cases.
- User-Centric Business Collaboration: Deep experience in aligning AI solutions with Bayer business 
   objectives and healthcare customer requirements.
- Effective Stakeholder Communication: Proficient in engaging diverse stakeholders for successful AI 
   project implementation.
- Up-to-date AI Knowledge: Committed to continuous learning in AI, with a focus on healthcare and IT- 
  specific applications.
- Technical Expertise in AI: Skilled in large language models, GPT, and other AI technologies “Azure AI 
   Studio, Microsoft Power Automate” for practical business applications. 
- Catalyst between the Bayer business and the IT to identify use cases into POCs, Coach AI Community 
   for Content Creation and Creator Prompt Library 
- Industry Partnership Utilization: Leverages strategic partnerships for enhanced AI solution delivery 
  (IBM, AWS, Microsoft)
- AI-Driven Business Process Improvement: Demonstrated ability in using AI for content creation, 
   automation, and business efficiency, experience with Midjourney.com, Pictory.ai, Murf.ai, Dall E 3, 
   Runwayml.com, ChatGPT Pro, Custom GPTs, MS Copilot, Synthesia.io, D-id.com and heygen.com and 
   more.
- AI Project Leadership: Strong project management skills with a track record of leading successful AI 
  initiatives.
- Data Analysis Proficiency: Skilled in quantitative analysis to inform  AI strategies and measure ROI.
- Change Management and Ethical AI Implementation: Experienced in guiding businesses through 
  responsible AI integration while ensuring ethical practices and compliance.

positions.title: Dozent Digitales Marketing Lab
positions.description:
The main motivation for this course is to give every student the opportunity to bring their personal ideas to life. Throughout the course, students will work on problem and value definition, develop a business model canvas, design a customer journey, and create a promotion plan. By the end, each student will deliver a perfect pitch to sell their business idea and develop a custom AI assistant to launch their venture with game-changing capabilities.
• Inspired and enabled students to explore new digital channels and technologies like AI and Mixed Reality at Media University in Berlin, Deutschland.
• Developed innovative opportunities and tactics to enhance student learning and engagement in the field of digital marketing.
• Collaborated with industry experts to bring real-world insights and experiences to the classroom, preparing students for the ever-evolving digital landscape.

positions.title: Trend Master - New generative AI Business Services - Healthcare Professional and Patient Engagement
positions.description:
Explorer of new digital channel services and opportunities with focus AI and new emerging technologies for patients and healthcare professionals to drive digital healthcare services for better life.
My Top Topics 2023 / 2024
- Open the generative AI door for our business and employes
- Virtual Engagement, next level Metaverse with AI
- AI automation, ask, create and execute anything 
- The virtual Assistant in a mixed reality world
- AI and robotics, new service supporting models

positions.title: Digital Marketing and Lead Generator
positions.description:
- Digital Campaign and Lead Generation 
- Voice Search Marketing
- Digital Promotion
- Digital Performance and Opportunity Management

positions.title: Senior Digital Marketing Consultant
positions.description:
- Digital Marketing Consulting focus on Multi Channel Marketing Performance
- Content Marketing for Brand / Campaign Websites and Media Channels
- Digital Advertising & Multi Channel Promotion
- Customer Journey Analytics
- Strategy for Lead and Engagement Optimization
- Agency Partnering
- Salesforce Marketing and Service Cloud Manager, Marketing Automation, Omni Channel, LiveChat  
- Innovation Scout for Trends like Audio Voice & Gestic Control, 3D Printing
- Conference Speaker for Digital Marketing Topics

Professional Diploma in Digital Marketing

Microsoft and Linkedin - What is generative AI?
Microsoft & Linkedin - Streamlining Your Work with Microsoft Bing Chat

allData.headline: AI Transformation Lead & New Technology Enthusiast at Healthcare Bayer AG
allData.summary:
I am a Generative AI Transformation Lead & Mission Master Healthcare at Bayer, with over 4 years of experience in developing and implementing AI strategies for business transformation and customer-centric services. My mission is to enhance the quality of life for patients and healthcare professionals through innovative digital solutions that leverage the power of AI and metaverse technologies.

As a generative AI enthusiast, I excel in creating solutions that improve healthcare outcomes and productivity. As a virtual engagement expert, I craft immersive experiences that foster meaningful connections in the digital realm. As a digital transformation champion, I propel the healthcare industry forward through digital value chain thinking. As an active innovative content producer, I share my expertise and insights with the world through various platforms and channels. I thrive in challenging environments surrounded by enthusiastic and energetic individuals who share my passion for groundbreaking ideas.
